Actions.Name: Hook Added
Actions.Description: A new hook has been added to this Cloud PKI deployment

Actions.Name: Request Approved
Actions.Description: A certificate request has been approved for issuance by a Certificate Manager

Actions.Name: Connector Action Completed
Actions.Description: An action executed by the Cloud PKI Connector has completed.

Actions.Name: Delete Hook
Actions.Description: Delete a hook subscribed to this deployment by its ID

Actions.Name: Request Denied
Actions.Description: A certificate request has been denied issuance by a Certificate Manager

Actions.Name: Certificate Expired
Actions.Description: A certificate has expired.

Actions.Name: Certificate Expiring
Actions.Description: A certificate is expiring in 60 days

Actions.Name: Connector Action Failed
Actions.Description: An action executed by the Cloud PKI Connector has failed.

Actions.Name: Request Failed
Actions.Description: A certificate request has failed to be processed by the Certificate Authority

Actions.Name: Get Actions
Actions.Description: Retrieve upcoming required actions for this PKI

Actions.Name: Get Authentication Details
Actions.Description: Gets the Azure Authentication Details for the Current Session

Actions.Name: Get Certificate
Actions.Description: Get a Certificate by its SHA1 Thumbprint

Actions.Name: Get Connector Action
Actions.Description: Get a Connector Action by its Action ID

Actions.Name: Get Certificate Revocation List (CRL)
Actions.Description: Get a Certificate Revocation List from this deployment by its CRL ID

Actions.Name: Get Hook
Actions.Description: Get a hook subscribed to this deployment by its HookID

Actions.Name: Get Published Certificate
Actions.Description: Download Issued Certificates for Submitters and Owners

Actions.Name: Get Published Templates
Actions.Description: Gets Published Templates for Certificate Requests

Actions.Name: Get Request
Actions.Description: Retrieve a Certificate Signing Request (CSR)

Actions.Name: Get Template
Actions.Description: Fetch a certificate template configuration

Actions.Name: Get User Deployments
Actions.Description: Retrieves the users configured deployments

Actions.Name: Certificate Issued
Actions.Description: A new certificate has been issued by the Certificate Authority

Actions.Name: CRL Issued
Actions.Description: A new certificate revocation list (CRL) has been issued by the Certificate Authority

Actions.Name: Connector Action Added
Actions.Description: A new Cloud PKI Connector action has been Added.

Actions.Name: New Hook
Actions.Description: Add a new hook to this Cloud PKI Deployment

Actions.Name: New Request
Actions.Description: New Certificate Request

Actions.Name: Request Pending Approval
Actions.Description: A new certificate request is pending approval from a Certificate Manager

Actions.Name: Template Published
Actions.Description: A certificate template has been published by the Certificate Authority

Actions.Name: Query Certificates
Actions.Description: Query Certificates Issued by this Cloud PKI deployment

Actions.Name: Query Certificate Revocation Lists (CRLs)
Actions.Description: Queries for CRLs based on selected criteria

Actions.Name: Query Hooks
Actions.Description: Query all hooks in this Cloud PKI Deployment

Actions.Name: Query Requests
Actions.Description: Query Certificate Signing Requests

Actions.Name: Query Certificate Templates
Actions.Description: Search for certificate templates

Actions.Name: Hook Removed
Actions.Description: A hook has been removed from this Cloud PKI deployment

Actions.Name: Certificate Renewing
Actions.Description: A certificate is available for renewal.

Actions.Name: Certificate Revoked
Actions.Description: An existing certificate has been revoked by the Certificate Authority

Actions.Name: Connector Action Stalled
Actions.Description: An action executed by the Cloud PKI Connector has stalled.

Actions.Name: Template Unpublished
Actions.Description: A certificate template has been unpublished by the Certificate Authority

Actions.Name: Update Certificate
Actions.Description: Change the status or metadata of a certificate

Actions.Name: Certificate Updated
Actions.Description: An existing certificate's CloudPKI properties have been updated.

Actions.Name: Request Updated
Actions.Description: An existing request's CloudPKI properties have been updated.

Actions.Name: Template Updated
Actions.Description: A certificate template has been updated.

Actions.Name: Update Request
Actions.Description: Approve, Deny or Update an existing Certificate Request

Actions.Name: Update Template
Actions.Description: Change the status or metadata of a Template
